channel.title: Myst
channel.description:
Does anyone else have any Myst games? I have I II III and V I will hopefully get Myst IV soon I think Myst V has the hardest puzzles too
Myst is an adventure/puzzleg game serieas made by Cyanworlds. You play a nameless stranger travelling through worlds, or "Ages" as all of the charecters call them in Myst I, II, and III you see Atrus and Cathrine, and of course Sirrus and Achenar In Myst V you see Atrus and Catherine's daughter Yeesha as an ols woman. go to www.myst.com for more info on Myst and Uru: Ages beyond Myst
